title: Update fail with client plz
body: When i open League of Legends i need to wait for Drakan and xayah upate at 33 % i got Update fail i uninstall LoL and i install it  again and i got again update fail Help me plz i have Windows 7 Sorry for bad english >3

replies.body: At 33% your patcher is done scanning files and needs to connect to the patching server to grab updates.  You might have an unstable connection failing to make that connection and resulting in an error.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, and making sure to go over each step to rule out possibilities.  I hope that helps!
